00012 /*  IndexBufferDX9 implementation
00013 /*****************************************************************************/
00014 IndexBufferDX9::IndexBufferDX9( const char* name )
00015 {
00016     m_Name              = name;
00017     m_pBuffer           = NULL;    
00018 
00019     m_bDynamic          = false;   
00020     m_SizeBytes         = 0;  
00021     m_NIndices          = 0;   
00022     m_bLocked           = false;    
00023     m_NFilledIdx        = 0;
00024     m_IdxStride         = 0;
00025     m_FirstValidStamp   = 1;
00026     m_CurrentStamp      = 1;
00027 } // IndexBufferDX9::IndexBufferDX9
00028 
00029 void IndexBufferDX9::DeleteDeviceObjects()
00030 {
00031     SAFE_RELEASE( m_pBuffer );
00032 } // IndexBufferDX9::DeleteDeviceObjects
00033 
00034 void IndexBufferDX9::InvalidateDeviceObjects()
00035 {
00036     SAFE_RELEASE( m_pBuffer );
00037 } // IndexBufferDX9::InvalidateDeviceObjects
00038 
00039 void IndexBufferDX9::RestoreDeviceObjects()
00040 {
00041     if (!m_pBuffer) Create( m_NIndices*m_IdxStride, m_bDynamic, m_IndexSize );
00042 
00043     m_FirstValidStamp = m_CurrentStamp++;
00044     m_NFilledIdx = 0;
00045 } // IndexBufferDX9::RestoreDeviceObjects
00046 
00047 IDirect3DDevice9* GetDirect3DDevice();
00048 bool IndexBufferDX9::Create( int nBytes, bool bDynamic, IndexSize idxSize )
00049 {
00050     DeleteDeviceObjects();
00051     DWORD usage = D3DUSAGE_WRITEONLY;
00052     if (bDynamic) usage |= D3DUSAGE_DYNAMIC;
00053 
00054     D3DFORMAT format = D3DFMT_UNKNOWN;
00055     if (idxSize == isWORD) 
00056     {
00057         format = D3DFMT_INDEX16;
00058         m_IdxStride = 2;
00059     }
00060     else if (idxSize == isDWORD) 
00061     {
00062         format = D3DFMT_INDEX32;
00063         m_IdxStride = 4;
00064     }
00065     else return false;
00066     
00067 
00068     IDirect3DDevice9* pDevice = GetDirect3DDevice();
00069     if (!pDevice) return false;
00070 
00071     HRESULT hr = pDevice->CreateIndexBuffer( nBytes, usage, format, D3DPOOL_DEFAULT, &m_pBuffer, NULL );
00072     DX_CHK( hr );
00073     m_bDynamic      = bDynamic;    
00074     m_SizeBytes     = nBytes;   
00075     m_bLocked       = false;     
00076     m_NFilledIdx    = 0;
00077     m_NIndices      = nBytes/m_IdxStride;
00078     m_IndexSize     = idxSize;
00079 
00080     return (hr == S_OK);
00081 } // IndexBufferDX9::Create
00082 
00083 bool IndexBufferDX9::Bind()
00084 {
00085     assert( m_pBuffer );
00086     
00087     IDirect3DDevice9* pDevice = GetDirect3DDevice();
00088     if (!pDevice) return false;
00089 
00090     HRESULT hRes = pDevice->SetIndices( m_pBuffer );
00091     DX_CHK( hRes );
00092     return (hRes == S_OK);
00093 } // IndexBufferDX9::Bind
00094 
00095 void IndexBufferDX9::Purge()
00096 {
00097     m_FirstValidStamp = ++m_CurrentStamp;
00098     m_NFilledIdx = 0;
00099 } // VertexBufferDX9::Purge
00100 int ILockTime=0;
00101 BYTE* IndexBufferDX9::Lock( int firstIdx, int numIdx, DWORD& stamp, bool bDiscard )
00102 {
00103     if (!m_pBuffer || firstIdx + numIdx > m_NIndices || numIdx == 0) return NULL;
00104     void* ptr;
00105     DWORD flags = D3DLOCK_NOSYSLOCK;
00106     if (m_bDynamic)
00107     {
00108         if (bDiscard) flags |= D3DLOCK_DISCARD; else flags |= D3DLOCK_NOOVERWRITE;
00109     }
00110     if (bDiscard) 
00111     {
00112         m_FirstValidStamp = m_CurrentStamp;
00113         m_NFilledIdx = 0;
00114     }
00115 
00116     __beginT();
00117 
00118     DX_CHK( m_pBuffer->Lock( firstIdx*m_IdxStride, numIdx*m_IdxStride, &ptr, flags ) );
00119 
00120     __endT(ILockTime);
00121 
00122     //  assume client filled all the buffer area he has locked
00123     m_NFilledIdx = firstIdx + numIdx;
00124     stamp = m_CurrentStamp++;
00125     m_bLocked = true;
00126     return (BYTE*)ptr;
00127 } // IndexBufferDX9::Lock
00128 
00129 bool IndexBufferDX9::HasAppendSpace( int numIdx )
00130 {
00131     if (numIdx > m_NIndices || numIdx == 0) return false;
00132     if (m_NFilledIdx + numIdx > m_NIndices) return false;
00133     return true;
00134 }
00135 
00136 BYTE* IndexBufferDX9::LockAppend( int numIdx, int& offset, DWORD& stamp )
00137 {
00138     if (numIdx > m_NIndices || numIdx == 0) return NULL;
00139     BYTE* pBuf = NULL;
00140     bool bDiscard = false;
00141     if (m_NFilledIdx + numIdx > m_NIndices) 
00142     {
00143         bDiscard = true; 
00144         m_NFilledIdx = 0;
00145     }
00146     offset = m_NFilledIdx;
00147     pBuf = Lock( m_NFilledIdx, numIdx, stamp, bDiscard );
00148     if (!pBuf) return NULL;
00149     return pBuf;
00150 } // IndexBufferDX9::Append
00151 
00152 void IndexBufferDX9::Unlock()
00153 {
00154     m_bLocked = false;
00155     __beginT();
00156     DX_CHK( m_pBuffer->Unlock() );
00157     __endT(ILockTime);
00158 } // IndexBufferDX9::Unlock
